name: "The Shield"
description: A statue of "The Shield." Encircling the Soul of the Beauty, the Spear and Shield are interdependent, and the Shield stands for the determination to defend the living.

skills.name: Diadem of the Stale
skills.description: Applies a Barrier to enemy Argenti. Applies Barriers to all friendly units while in the Soulfreed state.

skills.name: Imitation of Alacritous Desire
skills.description: When receiving a killing blow, applies a Barrier to the attacker. Applies Barriers to all targets while in the Soulfreed state.
